location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no. 1550 of 1822 from the Secretary of the Government of Bombay to the Resident in the Persian Gulph [Gulf]

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: Text on the lower part of the recto side of the page is missing due to insect damage.

mods.abstract: Acquaints MacLeod with letter from Mr Secretary Babington to the Resident at Bushire, dated 28 October 1811, regarding the death of Mahomed Hussain Khaun [Muḥammad Ḥusayn Khān] and the pension of the older son of Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mahdī ‘Alī Khān].
